api-token.title: Access tokens
api-token.description: A Foris plugin allowing to manage remote API access tokens (for example for use in Spectator or Android application).

automation.title: Home automation
automation.description: Control software for home automation, including Turris Gadgets.

dev-detect.title: Device detection
dev-detect.description: Software for detecting new devices on local network (EXPERIMENTAL).

dvb.title: DVB tuner
dvb.description: Software for sharing television received by a DVB tuner on Turris. Does not include device drivers.

luci_controls.title: LuCI extensions
luci_controls.description: Several addional tabs and controls for the advanced LuCI interface.

majordomo.title: Majordomo
majordomo.description: Software for monitoring connections of devices in local network.

nas.title: NAS
nas.description: Services allowing to connect a disk to the router and use it as network data store.

honeypot.title: SSH Honeypot
honeypot.description: Trap for password-guessing robots on SSH.

lxc.title: LXC utilities
lxc.description: Set of utilities to manage Linux Containers (lightweight virtualization technology).

netutils.title: Extensions of network protocols
netutils.description: Support for additional protocols and connection types.

netmetr.title: Internet connection speed measurement
netmetr.description: Actively measures speed of Internet connection using netmetr.cz service (EXPERIMENTAL).

openvpn.title: OpenVPN
openvpn.description: An easy setup of OpenVPN server from Foris.

printserver.title: Print server
printserver.description: Services allowing to connect a printer to the router and use it for remote printing.

tor.title: Tor
tor.description: Service to increase anonymity on the Internet.

webcam.title: Web camera
webcam.description: Support to capture image with web camera.
